SEARCH
Package database

Class InventoryItem

java.lang.Object
database.InventoryItem
public class InventoryItem extends Object
Represents an inventory item in the system, including details such as item ID, name, quantity type, price, current stock, and reorder level.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    boolean
    isDelete
    Flag to indicate if the inventory item is marked for deletion.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs an InventoryItem with the specified details.

  • Field Details

    • isDelete

      public boolean isDelete

  • Constructor Details

    • InventoryItem

      public InventoryItem()
      Default constructor for creating an instance without setting properties initially.

    • InventoryItem

      public InventoryItem(int inventoryItemId, String itemName, String quantityType, double price, int currentStock, int reorderLevel)
      Constructs an InventoryItem with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      inventoryItemId - the unique identifier for the inventory item
      itemName - the name of the inventory item
      quantityType - the type of quantity measurement for the inventory item
      price - the price of the inventory item
      currentStock - the current stock level of the inventory item
      reorderLevel - the stock level at which more of the inventory item should be ordered
